chapter.text: 26|1|ta, seen, meem.
26|2|ye prakaashamay pustak kee aayaten hain.
26|3|sambhavatah, aap apana praan[1] kho dene vaale hain ki ve eemaan laane vaale nahin hain
26|4|yadi ham chaahen, to utaar den unapar aakaash se aisee nishaanee ki unakee gardanen usake aage jhukee kee jhukee rah jaayen[1].
26|5|aur nahin aatee hai unake paalanahaar, ati dayaavaan kee or se koee naee shiksha, parantu ve usase mukh pherane vaale ban jaate hain.
26|6|to unhonne jhuthala diya! ab unake paas sheeghr hee usakee soochanaen aa jaayengee, jisaka upahaas ve kar rahe the.
26|7|aur kya unhonne dharatee kee or nahin dekha ki hamane usamen ugaee hain, bahut-see pratyek prakaar kee achchhee vanaspatiyaan
26|8|nishchay hee, isamen badee nishaanee (lakshan)[1] hai. phir unamen adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin hain.
26|9|tatha vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee prabhutvashaalee, ati dayaavaan hai.
26|10|(unhen us samay kee katha sunao) jab pukaara aapake paalanahaar ne moosa ko ki jao atyaachaaree jaati[1] ke paas
26|11|firaun kee jaati ke paas, kya ve darate nahin
26|12|usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! vaastav mein, mujhe bhay hai ki ve mujhe jhuthala denge.
26|13|aur sankuchit ho raha hai mera seena aur nahin chal rahee hai meree zubaan, atah vahyee bhej de haaroon kee or (bhee).
26|14|aur unaka mujhapar ek aparaadh bhee hai. atah, main darata hoon ki ve mujhe maar daalenge.
26|15|allaah ne kahaah kadaapi aisa nahin hoga. tum donon hamaaree nishaaniyaan lekar jao, ham tumhaare saath sunane[1] vaale hain.
26|16|to tum donon jao aur kaho ki ham vishv ke paalanahaar ke bheje hue (rasool) hain.
26|17|ki too hamaare saath banee israeel ko jaane de.
26|18|(firaun ne) kahaah kya hamane tera paalan nahin kiya hai, apane yahaan baalyavastha mein aur too (nahin) raha hai, hamamen apanee aayu ke kaee varsh
26|19|aur too kar gaya vah kaary,[1] jo kiya aur too krtaghanon mein se hai
26|20|(moosa ne) kahaah mainne aisa us samay kar diya, jabaki main anajaan tha.
26|21|phir main tumase bhaag gaya, jab tumase bhay hua. phir pradaan kar diya mujhe, mere paalanahaar ne tatvadarshita aur mujhe bana diya rasoolon mein se.
26|22|aur ye koee upakaar hai, jo too mujhe jata raha hai ki toone daas bana liya hai, israeel ke putron ko.
26|23|firaun ne kahaah vishv ka paalanahaar kya hai
26|24|(moosa ne) kahaah aakaashon tatha dharatee aur usaka paalanahaar, jo kuchh donon ke beech hai, yadi tum vishvaas rakhane vaale ho.
26|25|usane unase kaha, jo usake aas-paas theh kya tum sun nahin rahe ho
26|26|(musa ne) kahaah tumhaara paalanahaar tatha tumhaare poorvojon ka paalanahaar hai.
26|27|(firaun ne) kahaah vaastav mein, tumhaara rasool, jo tumhaaree or bheja gaya hai, paagal hai.
26|28|(moosa ne) kahaah vah, poorv tatha pashchim tatha donon ke madhy jo kuchh hai, sabaka paalanahaar hai.
26|29|(firaun ne) kahaah yadi toone koee poojy bana liya mere atirikt, to tujhe bandiyon mein kar doonga.
26|30|(moosa ne) kahaah kya yadyapi main le aaoon tere paas ek khulee cheez
26|31|usane kahaah too use le aa, yadi sachcha hai.
26|32|phir usane apanee laathee phenk dee, to akasmaat vah ek pratyaksh ajagar ban gayee.
26|33|tatha apana haath nikaala, to akasmaat vah ujjval tha, dekhane vaalon ke lie.
26|34|usane apane pramukhon se kaha, jo usake paas theh vaastav mein, ye to bada daksh jaadoogar hai.
26|35|ye chaahata hai ki tumhen, tumhaaree dharatee se nikaal[1] de, apane jaadoo ke bal se, to ab tum kya aadesh dete ho
26|36|sabane kahaah avasar (samay) do moosa aur usake bhaee (ke vishay) ko aur bhej do nagaron mein ekatr karane vaalon ko.
26|37|ve tumhaare paas pratyek bade daksh jaadoogar ko laayen.
26|38|to ekatr kar lie gaye jaadoogar ek nishchit din ke samay ke lie.
26|39|tatha logon se kaha gaya ki kya tum ekatr hone vaale[1] ho
26|40|taaki ham peechhe chalen jaadoogaron ke yadi vahee prabhutvashaalee (vijayee) ho jaayen.
26|41|aur jab jaadoogar aaye, to firaun se kahaah kya hamen kuchh puraskaar milega, yadi ham hee prabhutvashaalee honge
26|42|usane kahaah haan! aur tum us samay (mere) sameepavartiyon mein ho jaoge.
26|43|moosa ne unase kahaah phenko, jo kuchh tum phenkane vaale ho.
26|44|to unhonne phenk dee upanee rassiyaan tatha apanee laathiyaan tatha kahaah firaun ke prabhutv kee shapath! ham hee avashy prabhutvashaalee (vijayee) honge.
26|45|ab moosa ne phenk dee apanee laathee, to tatkshan vah nigalane lagee (use), jo jhooth ve bana rahe the.
26|46|to gir gaye sabhee jaadoogar[1] sajda karate hue.
26|47|aur sabane kah diyaah ham vishv ke paalanahaar par eemaan laaye.
26|48|moosa tatha haaroon ke paalanahaar par.

26|49|(firaun ne) kahaah tum usaka vishvaas kar baithe, isase pahale ki main tumhen aagya doon? vaastav mein, vah tumhaara bada (guroo) hai, jisane tumhen jaadoo sikhaaya hai, to tumhen sheeghr gyaan ho jaayega, main avashy tumhaare haathon tatha pairon ko vipareet disha[1] se kaat doonga tatha tum sabhee ko phaansee de doonga
26|50|sabane kahaah koee chinta nahin, hamato apane paalanahaar heekee or phirakar jaane vaale hain.
26|51|ham aasha rakhate hain ki kshama kar dega, hamaare lie, hamaara paalanahaar, hamaare paapon ko, kyonki ham sabase pahale eemaan laane vaale hain.
26|52|aur hamane moosa kee or vahyee kee ki raaton-raat nikal ja mere bhakton ko lekar, tum sabaka peechha kiya jaayega.
26|53|to firaun ne bhej diya nagaron mein (sena) ekatr karane[1] vaalon ko.
26|54|ki ve bahut thode log hain.
26|55|aur (isapar bhee) ve hamen ati krodhit kar rahe hain.
26|56|aur vaastav mein, ham ek giroh hain saavadhaan rahane vaale.
26|57|antatah, hamane nikaal diya unhen, baagon tatha sroton se.
26|58|tatha koshon aur uttam nivaas sthaanon se.
26|59|isee prakaar hua aur hamane unaka uttaraadhikaaree bana diya, israeel kee santaan ko.
26|60|to unhonne unaka peechha kiya, praatah hote hee.
26|61|aur jab donon girohon ne ek-doosare ko dekh liya, to moosa ke saathiyon ne kahaah hamato nishchay hee pakad lie[1] gaye.
26|62|(moosa ne) kahaah kadaapi nahin, nishchay mere saath mera paalanahaar hai.
26|63|to hamane moosa ko vahyee kee ki maar apanee laathee se saagar ko, akasmaat saagar phat gaya tatha pratyek bhaag, bhaaree parvat ke samaan[1] ho gaya.
26|64|tatha hamane sameep kar diya usee sthaan ke, doosare giroh ko.
26|65|aur mukti pradaan kar dee moosa aur usake sab saathiyon ko.
26|66|phir hamane dubo diya doosaron ko.
26|67|vaastav mein, isamen badee shiksha hai aur unamen se adhiktar log eemaan vaale nahin the.
26|68|tatha vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar nishchay atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai.
26|69|tatha aap, unhen suna den, ibraaheem ka samaachaar (bhee).
26|70|jab usane kaha, apane baap tatha apanee jaati se ki tum kya pooj rahe ho
26|71|unhonne kahaah ham moortiyon kee pooja kar rahe hain aur unheen kee seva mein lage rahate hain.
26|72|usane kahaah kya ve tumhaaree sunatee hain, jab tum pukaarate ho
26|73|ya tumhen laabh pahunchaatee ya haani pahunchaatee hain
26|74|unhonne kahaah balki hamane apane poorvojon ko aisa hee karate hue paaya hai.
26|75|usane kahaah kya tumane kabhee (aankh kholakar) use dekha, jise tum pooj rahe ho.
26|76|tum tatha tumhaare pahale poorvaj
26|77|kyonki ye sab mere shatru hain, poore vishv ke paalanahaar ke siva.
26|78|jisane mujhe paida kiya, phir vahee mujhe maarg darsha raha hai.
26|79|aur jo mujhe khilaata aur pilaata hai.
26|80|aur jab rogee hota hoon, to vahee mujhe svasth karata hai.
26|81|tatha vahee mujhe maarega, phir[1] mujhe jeevit karega.
26|82|tatha main aasha rakhata hoon ki kshama kar dega, mere lie, mere paap, pratikaar (pralay) ke din.
26|83|he mere paalanahaar! pradaan kar de mujhe tatvadarshita aur mujhe sammilit kar sadaachaariyon mein।
26|84|aur mujhe sachchee khyaati pradaan kar, aagaamee logon mein.
26|85|aur bana de mujhe, sukh ke svarg ka uttaraadhikaaree.
26|86|tatha mere baap ko kshama kar de,[1] vaastav mein, vah kupathon mein se hai.
26|87|tatha mujhe niraadar na kar, jis din sab jeevit kiye[1] jaayenge.
26|88|jis din, laabh nahin dega koee dhan aur na santaan.
26|89|parantu, jo allaah ke paas svachchh dil lekar aayega.
26|90|aur sameep kar dee jaayegee svarg aagyaakaariyon ke lie.
26|91|tatha khol dee jaayegee narak kupathon ke lie.
26|92|tatha kaha jaayegaah kahaan hain ve, jinhen tum pooj rahe the
26|93|allaah ke siva, kya ve tumhaaree sahaayata karenge athava svayan apanee sahaayata kar sakate hain
26|94|phir usamen aundhe jhonk diye jaayenge ve aur sabhee kupath.
26|95|aur iblees kee sena sabhee.
26|96|aur ve usamen aapas mein jhagadate hue kahangeh
26|97|allaah kee shapath! vaastav mein, ham khule kupath mein the.
26|98|jab ham tumhen, baraabar samajh rahe the vishv ke paalanahaar ke.
26|99|aur hamen kupath nahin kiya, parantu aparaadhiyon ne.
26|100|to hamaara koee abhistaavak (sifaarishee) nahin rah gaya.
26|101|tatha na koee premee mitr.
26|102|to yadi hamen punah sansaar mein jaana hota,[1] to ham eemaan vaalon mein ho jaate.
26|103|nihsandeh, isamen badee nishaanee hai aur unamen se adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin hain.
26|104|aur vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee ati prabhutvashaalee,[1] dayaavaan hai.
26|105|nooh kee jaati ne bhee rasoolon ko jhuthalaaya.
26|106|jab unase unake bhaee nooh ne kahaah kya tum (allaah se) darate nahin ho
26|107|vaastav mein, main tumhaare lie ek[1] rasool hoon.
26|108|atah, tum allaah se daro aur meree baat maano.
26|109|main nahin maangata isapar tumase koee paarishramik (badala), mera badala to bas sarvalok ke paalanahaar par hai.
26|110|atah, tum allaah se daro aur meree aagya ka paalan karo.
26|111|unhonne kahaah kya ham tujhe maan len, jabaki tera anusaran patit (neech) log[1] kar rahe hain
26|112|(nooh ne) kahaah moojhe ky gyaan ki ve kya karm karate rahe hain
26|113|unaka haisaab to bas mere paalanahaar ke oopar hai, yadi tum samajho.
26|114|aur main dhutakaarane vaala[1] nahin hoon, eemaan vaalon ko.
26|115|main to bas khula saavadhaan karane vaala hoon.
26|116|unhonne kahaah yadi ruka nahin, he nooh! to too avashy patharaav karake maare huon mein hoga.
26|117|usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! meree jaati ne mujhe jhuthala diya.
26|118|atah, too nirnay kar de mere aur unake beech aur mukt kar de mujhe tatha unhen jo mere saath hain, eemaan vaalon mein se.
26|119|to hamane use mukt kar diya tatha unhen jo usake saath bharee naav mein the.
26|120|phir hamane dubo diya usake pashchaat, shesh logon ko.
26|121|vaastav mein, isamen ek badee nishaanee (shiksha) hai tatha unamen se adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin.
26|122|aur nishchay aapaka paalanahaar hee ati prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai.
26|123|jhuthala diya aad (jaati) ne (bhee) rasoolon ko.
26|124|jab kaha unase, unake bhaee hood[1] neh kya tum darate nahin ho
26|125|vastutah, main tumhaare lie ek nyaasik (amaanatadaar) rasool hoon.
26|126|atah, allaah se daro aur mera anupaalan karo.
26|127|aur main tumase koee paarishramik (badala) nahin maangata, mera badala to bas sarvalok ke paalanahaar par hai.
26|128|kyon tum bana lete ho, har oonche sthaan par ek yaadagaar bhavan, vyarth mein
26|129|tatha banaate ho, bade-bade bhavan, jaise ki tum sada rahoge.
26|130|aur jabakisee ko pakadate ho, to pakadate ho, maha atyaachaaree banakar.
26|131|to allaah se daro aur meree aagya ka paalan karo.
26|132|tatha usase bhay rakho, jisane tumhaaree sahaayata kee hai usase, jo tum jaanate ho.
26|133|usane sahaayata kee hai tumhaaree chaupaayon tatha santaan se.
26|134|tatha baagon (udyaano) tatha jal sroton se.
26|135|main tumapar darata hoon, bheeshan din kee yaatana se.
26|136|unhonne kahaah naseehta karo ya na karo, hamapar sab samaan hai.
26|137|ye baat to bas praacheen logon kee neeti[1] hai.
26|138|aur ham unamen se nahin hain, jinhen yaatana dee jaayegee.
26|139|antatah, unhonne hamen jhuthala diya, to hamane unhen dhvast kar diya. nishchay isamen ek badee nishaanee (shiksha) hai aur logon mein adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin hain.
26|140|aur vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai.
26|141|jhuthala diya samood ne (bhee)[1] rasoolon ko.
26|142|jab kaha unase unake bhaee saaleh neh kya tum darate nahin ho
26|143|vaastav mein, main tumhaara vishvasaneey rasool hoon.
26|144|to tum allaah se daro aur mera kaha maano.
26|145|tatha main nahin maangata isapar tumase koee paarishramik, mera paarishramik to bas sarvalok ke paalanahaar par hai.
26|146|kya tum chhod diye jaoge usamen, jo yahaan hain nishchint rahakar
26|147|baagon tatha sroton mein.
26|148|tatha kheton aur khajooron mein, jinake guchchhe ras bhare hain.
26|149|tatha tumaparvaton ko taraashakar ghar banaate ho, garv karate hue.
26|150|atah, allaah se daro aur mera anupaalan karo.
26|151|aur paalan na karo ullanghanakaariyon ke aadesh ka.
26|152|jo upadrav karate hain dharatee mein aur sudhaar nahin karate.
26|153|unhonne kahaah vaastav mein, too unamen se hai, jinapar jaadoo kar diya gaya hai.
26|154|too to bas hamaare samaan ek maanav hai. to koee chamatkaar le aa, yadi too sachcha hai.
26|155|kahaah ye oontanee hai,[1] isake lie paanee peene ka ek din hai aur tumhaare lie paanee lene ka nishchit din hai.
26|156|tatha use haath na lagaana buraee se, anyatha tumhen pakad legee ek bheeshan din kee yaatana.
26|157|to unhonne vadh kar diya use, antatah, pachhataane vaale ho gaye.
26|158|aur pakad liya unhen yaatana ne. vastutah, isamen badee nishaanee hai aur nahin the unamen se adhiktar eemaan vaale.
26|159|aur nishchay aapaka paalanahaar hee atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai.
26|160|jhuthala diya loot kee jaati ne (bhee) rasoolon ko.
26|161|jab kaha unase unake bhaee loot neh kya tum darate nahin ho
26|162|vaastav mein, main tumhaare lie ek amaanatadaar rasool hoon.
26|163|atah allaah se daro aur mera anupaalan karo.
26|164|aur main tumase prashn nahin karata, isapar kisee paarishramik (badale) ka. mera badala to bas sarvalok ke paalanahaar par hai.
26|165|kya tum jaate[1] ho purushon ke paas, sansaar vaasiyon mein se.
26|166|tatha chhod dete ho use, jise paida kiya hai tumhaare paalanahaar ne, arthaat apanee ptaniyon ko, balki tum ek jaati ho, seema ka ullanghan karane vaalee.
26|167|unhonne kahaah yadi too nahin ruka, he loot! to avashy tera bahishkaar kar diya jaayega.
26|168|usane kahaah vaastav mein, main tumhaare karatoot se bahut aprasann hoon.
26|169|mere paalanahaar! mujhe bacha le tatha mere parivaar ko usase, jo ve kar rahe hain.
26|170|to hamane use bacha liya tatha usake sabhee parivaar ko.
26|171|parantu, ek budhiya[1] ko, jo peechhe rah jaane vaalon mein thee.
26|172|phir hamane vinaash kar diya doosaron ka.
26|173|aur varsha kee unapar, ek ghor[1] varsha. to buree ho gayee daraaye hue logon kee varsha.
26|174|vaastav mein, isamen ek badee nishaanee (shiksha) hai aur unamen se adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin the.
26|175|aur nishchay aapaka paalanahaar hee atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai.
26|176|jhuthala diya aiyka[1] vaalon ne rasoolon ko.
26|177|jab kaha unase shoaib neh kya tum darate nahin ho
26|178|main tumhaare lie ek vishvasaneey rasool hoon.
26|179|atah, allaah se daro tatha meree aagya ka paalan karo.
26|180|aur main nahin maangata tumase isapar koee paarishramik, mera paarishramik to bas samast vishv ke paalanahaar par hai.
26|181|tum naap-tol poora karo aur na bano kam dene vaalon mein.
26|182|aur tolo seedhee taraazoo se.
26|183|aur mat kam do logon ko unakee cheezen aur mat phiro dharatee mein upadrav phailaate.
26|184|aur daro usase, jisane paida kiya hai tumhen tatha agale logon ko.
26|185|unhonne kahaahvaastav mein, too unamen se hai, jinapar jaadoo kar diya gaya hai.
26|186|aur too to bas ek purush[1] hai, hamaare samaan aur ham to tujhe jhoothon mein samajhate hain.
26|187|to hamapar gira de koee khand aakaash ka, yadi too sachcha hai.
26|188|usane kahaah mera paalanahaar bhalee prakaar jaanata hai use, jo kuchh tum kar rahe ho.
26|189|to unhonne use jhuthala diya. antatah, pakad liya unhen chhaaya ke[1] din kee yaatana ne. vastutah, vah ek bheeshan din kee yaatana thee.
26|190|nishchay hee, isamen ek badee nishaanee (shiksha) hai aur nahin the unamen adhiktar eemaan laane vaale.
26|191|aur vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan hai.
26|192|tatha nihsandeh, ye (quraan) poore vishv ke paalanahaar ka utaara hua hai.
26|193|ise lekar roohul ameen[1] utara.
26|194|aapake dil par, taaki aap ho jaayen saavadhaan karane vaalon mein.
26|195|khulee arabee bhaasha mein.
26|196|tatha isakee charcha[1] agale rasoolon kee pustakon mein (bhee) hai.
26|197|kya aur unake lie ye nishaanee nahin hai ki israeeliyon ke vidvaan[1] ise jaanate hain.
26|198|aur yadi ham ise utaar dete kisee ajamee[1] par.
26|199|aur vah, ise unake samaksh padhata, to ve usapar eemaan laane vaale na hote[1].
26|200|isee prakaar, hamane ghusa diya hai is (quraan ke inkaar) ko paapiyon ke dilon mein.
26|201|ve nahin eemaan laayenge usapar, jab tak dekh nahin lenge duhkhadaayee yaatana.
26|202|phir, vah unapar sahasa aa jaayegee aur ve samajh bhee nahin paayenge.
26|203|to kahengeh kya hamen avasar diya jaayega
26|204|to kya ve hamaaree yaatana kee jaldee macha rahe hain
26|205|(he nabee!) to kya aapane vichaar kiya ki yadi ham laabh pahunchaayen inhen varshon.
26|206|phir aa jaaye unapar vah, jisakee unhen dhamakee dee ja rahee thee.
26|207|to kuchh kaam nahin aayega unake, jo unhen laabh pahunchaaya jaata raha
26|208|aur hamane kisee bastee ka vinaash nahin kiya, parantu usake lie saavadhaan karane vaale the.
26|209|shiksha dene ke lie aur ham atyaachaaree nahin hain.
26|210|tatha nahin utare hain (is quraan) ko lekar shaitaan.
26|211|aur na yogy hai unake lie aur na ve isakee shakti rakhate hain.
26|212|vaastav mein, ve to (isake) sunane se bhee door[1] kar diye gaye hain.
26|213|atah, aap na pukaaren allaah ke saath kisee any poojy ko, anyatha aap danditon mein ho jaayenge.
26|214|aur aap saavadhaan kar den apane sameepavartee[1] sambandhiyon ko.
26|215|aur jhuka den apana baahu[1] usake lie, jo aapaka anuyaayee ho, eemaan vaalon mein se.
26|216|aur yadi ve aapakee avagya karen, to aap kah den ki main nirdosh hoon usase, jo tum kar rahe ho.
26|217|tatha aap bharosa karen atyant prabhutvashaalee, dayaavaan par.
26|218|jo dekhata hai aapako, jis samay (namaaz) mein khade hote hain.
26|219|aur aapake phirane ko sajda karane[1] vaalon mein.
26|220|nihsandeh, vahee sab kuchh sunane-jaanane vaala hai.
26|221|kya main tum sabako bataoon ki kisapar shaitaan utarate hain
26|222|ve utarate hain, pratyek jhoothe paapee[1] par.
26|223|ve pahuncha dete hain, sunee sunaee baaton ko aur unamen adhiktar jhoothe hain.
26|224|aur kaviyon ka anusaran bahake hue log karate hain.
26|225|kya aap nahin dekhate ki ve pratyek vaadee mein phirate[1] hain.
26|226|aur aisee baat kahate hain, jo karate nahin.

26|227|parantu vo (kavi), jo[1] eemaan laaye, sadaachaar kiye, allaah ka bahut smaran kiya tatha badala liya isake pashchaat ki unake oopar atyaachaar kiya gaya! tatha sheeghr hee jaan lenge, jinhonne atyaachaar kiya hai ki va kis dushparinaam kee or phirate hain
